text: Ama ana nanekema eri'za eme huama'ma hu'nazana, ruotage'ma hu'naza ankeromo'za ama anazana fore hugahie hu'za huhankaveti'za eme huama hu'naze. E'ina hu'negu maka vahe'mo'zama ke'za antahi'zama hanazana, Marerisa Anumzamo maka ama mopa kegava hu'neankino, agi me'nesnia vahero, agi omne vahero amne huhampri antesnigeno kinia manigahie hu'za maka vahe'mo'za ke'za antahi'za hugahaze.
